artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Hyacinthe Rigaud
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: portrait of a man wearing a long, curly powdered wig and generous flowering garment, surrounded by a cartouche with name; inscription below cartouche
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Rigaud pinxit]; LRC, in the plate: [Lalive D.J. Sculpsit]
title: Portrait of Ludovicus Dionisius Lalive de Bellegarde, no. 41, from a recueil of etchings
